events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The system identified that the customer's request involves a refund due to receiving an incorrect product.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello, Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to help us process the refund?
Here are the photos of the item I received along with the order number 987654321 as you requested.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund offer. Looking forward to the payment being credited soon.
The refund has been successfully processed. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, I have received the refund in full. Thank you for resolving this quickly and efficiently.
The case has been closed following confirmation of the refund receipt and customer satisfaction.
